title: Michael Jackson’s daughter Paris criticises ‘sugar-coated’ biopic about her father
summary: A 27-year-old individual has criticized the upcoming 2026 film "Michael," claiming it caters to a niche segment of their father's fanbase that remains entrenched in fantasy. The individual also denied any personal involvement with the film. Their remarks highlight concerns about the film's target audience and authenticity.
